thread.title: ‘La La Land’ gets re-imagined as a David Lynch psychodrama
thread.title_full: ‘La La Land’ gets re-imagined as a David Lynch psychodrama

author: Oliver Gettell
title: ‘La La Land’ gets re-imagined as a David Lynch psychodrama
text:
Email 
Damien Chazelle’s La La Land has charmed audiences with its upbeat musical numbers, candy-colored costumes, and dreamy Hollywood vistas — but perhaps there’s something sinister lurking beneath the glitz and glamor. 
A new video from Trailer Mix imagines what the Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone romance would look like if it were directed by David Lynch ( Mulholland Drive , Twin Peaks ), and the results are just as creepy and surreal as you’d imagine. From ominous dialogue to shadowy lighting to freaky sound effects, it’s enough to turn a city of stars into a waking nightmare. 
Watch the La La Land re-imagining above. Show Full Article
